the boy who was raised as a dog Bruce D. Perry 618.92 Perry Focused on how trauma effects children, this covers many stories in detail from which people have faced during their younger years. Covers topics interpretively such as the neuroscience and developmental theory behind how trauma effects a person, especially those who are children. Mosby's pediatric nursing reference Author: Betz, Cecily Lynn. 610.73 Mosby's DAVIE Contains appendices on mental health, non-accidental trauma, and growth charts that is essential to those working with children. medical, psychological, nursing

The first three years & beyond : brain development and social policy by Zigler, Edward, 1930- 305.231 Zig DAVIE Written targeting parents and policymakers, this gives a background on how childrens' brains develop and addressing problems that occur during early childhood development.
